entry.title: What Is Perpetual Poppycock
entry.summary:
Do you ever have internal struggles with decisions or is indecision dominating your life? Well, thatâ€™s me. In a nutshell, I am a chronically bad decision maker.
I suffer from sever Perpetual Poppycock Syndrome. This blog is my attempt to force recovery
